original_title: Animated Hero Classics: Alexander Graham Bell
overview: Alexander Graham Bell (March 3, 1847-August 2, 1922) was a scientist, inventor, and innovator. Perhaps due to his family's association with the teaching of elocution-the study of formal speaking in pronunciation, grammar, style, and tone-Alexander Graham Bell had an infatuation with acoustics, the study of sound.
title: Animated Hero Classics: Alexander Graham Bell
